name: Firefox (DevEdit) - Compact+black
description:
Some expérimentations to make it more black and compact
Based on Firefox Developer Edition (mac) theme (skin needed)
additional_info:
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
NOT QUANTUM READY 
¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡¡


You can use https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/addon/devedition-theme-enabler/?src=ss
if you dont use the DarkTheme of this Firefox Edition...



Addons/preferences pages in black
FF window background is BLACK so, when page loading you dont have a white flash in your face
(if you are light'sensitive or a vampire – like I am – it's can be a vital plus)

Try some colors on Pendings/Pinded tabs...
